[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@imhonglu/format](./format.md) &gt; [IdnMailbox](./format.idnmailbox.md)

## IdnMailbox class

The IdnMailbox formatter based on RFC 5321.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class IdnMailbox 
```

## Example


```ts
IdnMailbox.parse("john.doe\@한국.com");
// {
//   localPart: {
//     unicode: "john.doe",
//     ascii: "john.doe"
//   },
//   domain: {
//     unicode: { labels: ["한국", "com"], tld: ".com" },
//     ascii: { labels: ["xn--3e0b707e", "com"], tld: ".com" },
//     type: "idn-hostname"
//   }
// }
```
